description:
Ichimiya confidence as a senpai has not grown much since supervising the 3 newcomers.  His chance to prove himself arrives with Lucy needing help with a “sensitive” subject.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention à la sécurité du bureau et de son corps
Don`t Neglect the Safety of You or Your Workplace
Okotaru na Shokuba no Anzen Mi no Anzen
怠るな 職場の安全 身の安全
